name: 伊凡尼·埃齐姆
name_full: 伊凡尼·埃齐姆 Ifeanyi Ezieme
introduction: Ifeanyi Ezieme is a Nigerian-American filmmaker based in Los Angeles, CA. He is a George Lucas scholar at the USC School of Cinematic Arts pursuing his MFA. Ifeanyi completed his undergraduate degree at Pepperdine University where he made a series of short films that have gained international recognition. He is a writer, director, producer, editor, & cinematographer.
